resources.string: Every Plumber is skill checked,\nbackground verifies and continuously \nevaluated
Fixed hourly rates for all your service\nneeds
30 days service guarantee and upto INR\n10,000 of damage protection on each \nbooking
Pay if you take service,as per rate \ncard shared next
Recommended for installation of \nmajor hardware fittings like Western\nToilet,Wash Basin etc
Rs 100 for every 60 minutes for helper \n(if required for complex work)
Prices for Drain and Pipe Blockage work will be \nprovided after inspection
